name: Try not to Die (gustavohvs)
description:
Try not to Die is a game that will challenge you, we'll be very sincerely with you...
You will die a lot and probably try destroy your smartphone throwing it against the wall, but if you really think you're prepared to that challenge, go ahead man, we're waiting for you!

Game Features:
- Evil obstacles and cruel enemies trying annihilate you.
- Friendly guys who will help you on your journey.
- Different weapons.
- Interactive objects.
- Boss fights.

And remember, you have only three lifes to get at the end of the game, good luck!
